<u>CONFIDENTIAL<\u> 
ROYAL SOCIETY .
REFEREE'S REPORT. 
To the Chairman of the Sectional Committee for Physics & Chemistry 
Paper by N. Bohr 
On the determination of the tension of a recently formed 
water surface 
 
1. Should the paper be published 'Proceedings'? Yes 
2. If published, should it be printed as it stands, or with modifications? 
In full 
<s>3. Should all the illustrations be published?<\s> 
<s>4. If not published, should it be read before the Society?<\s> 
General Remarks. 
The paper is decidedly controversial but it appears 
to me that the author is right & that there is no 
objection to it on this account. 
<u>C.V. Boys<\u>
